definition.name: Breadcrumb
definition.purpose: Provides a navigation landmark for breadcrumb navigation.
definition.description: A wrapper component that renders a <nav> element with appropriate ARIA attributes for breadcrumb navigation. It is intended to be used as the container for breadcrumb lists.

children.description: The breadcrumb list and items to be rendered inside the navigation.

visible: A <nav> element with aria-label set to 'breadcrumb'
A <nav> element
A <nav> element containing breadcrumb list and items

effects: Breadcrumb navigation is displayed with its children

definition.visualLayout: A <nav> element wrapping the breadcrumb list and items.
definition.implementationNotes: Passes all props to the <nav> element. Sets aria-label to 'breadcrumb'.

definition.name: BreadcrumbList
definition.purpose: Displays the list of breadcrumb items.
definition.description: A component that renders an ordered list (<ol>) for breadcrumb items, applying appropriate styling and accepting additional props.

children.description: Breadcrumb items to be rendered inside the list.

visible: An <ol> element with default and custom classes

when.description: Breadcrumb items are provided as children.

visible: An <ol> element
An <ol> element containing breadcrumb items

effects: Breadcrumb items are displayed in a styled list

definition.visualLayout: A flex-wrapped ordered list for breadcrumb items.
definition.implementationNotes: Applies default and custom classes using the cn utility.

definition.name: BreadcrumbItem
definition.description: A component that renders a list item (<li>) for a breadcrumb, applying appropriate styling and accepting additional props.

visible: A <li> element with default and custom classes

when.description: Breadcrumb item content is provided as children.

visible: A <li> element
A <li> element containing the breadcrumb content

effects: Breadcrumb item is displayed in the list

definition.visualLayout: An inline-flex list item for a breadcrumb.
definition.implementationNotes: Applies default and custom classes using the cn utility.

definition.name: BreadcrumbLink
definition.purpose: Renders a link within a breadcrumb item, optionally as a custom component.
definition.description: A component that renders a link (<a>) or a custom component (using Slot) for breadcrumb navigation. It applies styling and accepts additional props, including an 'asChild' prop to render as a custom component.

asChild.description: If true, renders as a custom component using Slot.

visible: A link element (<a>) or custom component with default and custom classes

when.description: Breadcrumb link content is provided as children.

visible: A link element or custom component
A link element or custom component containing the breadcrumb content

effects: Breadcrumb link is displayed in the item

definition.visualLayout: A styled link or custom component for breadcrumb navigation.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses Slot from @radix-ui/react-slot if asChild is true, otherwise renders an <a> element. Applies default and custom classes using the cn utility.

definition.name: BreadcrumbPage
definition.purpose: Displays the current page in the breadcrumb trail.
definition.description: A component that renders a <span> element styled as the current page in the breadcrumb, with appropriate ARIA attributes for accessibility.

children.description: Content of the current breadcrumb page.

visible: A <span> element with ARIA attributes and default/custom classes

when.description: Breadcrumb page content is provided as children.

visible: A <span> element
A <span> element containing the current page content

effects: Current page is displayed in the breadcrumb trail

definition.visualLayout: A styled <span> element for the current breadcrumb page.
definition.implementationNotes: Sets role='link', aria-disabled='true', and aria-current='page' for accessibility. Applies default and custom classes using the cn utility.

definition.name: BreadcrumbSeparator
definition.description: A component that renders a separator (by default a ChevronRight icon) between breadcrumb items. Accepts custom children to override the default separator.

children.description: Custom separator content. Defaults to a ChevronRight icon.

visible: A <li> element with a separator icon or custom content

when.description: Custom separator content is provided as children.

visible: A <li> element with ChevronRight icon
A <li> element with custom separator content

effects: Custom separator is displayed between breadcrumb items

definition.visualLayout: A <li> element with a separator icon or custom content.
definition.implementationNotes: Defaults to ChevronRight from lucide-react if no children are provided. Applies default and custom classes using the cn utility.

definition.name: BreadcrumbEllipsis
definition.purpose: Indicates collapsed breadcrumb items with an ellipsis.
definition.description: A component that renders an ellipsis (three dots) to indicate collapsed breadcrumb items, using the MoreHorizontal icon and a screen-reader-only label.

visible: A <span> element with MoreHorizontal icon and 'More' label for screen readers
A <span> element with MoreHorizontal icon and 'More' label

effects: Ellipsis is displayed in the breadcrumb trail

definition.visualLayout: A <span> element with an icon and screen-reader label.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses MoreHorizontal from lucide-react. Applies default and custom classes using the cn utility.
